summary: A retexture of the Nightingale armor. Female version is WIP.
descriptionHtml:
[color=black][b]Nightingale Armor Re-texture[/b][/color]

Low-res and High-res versions available. NOTE: Pictures above are low-res version.

My first "mod" ever, it's just a simple retexture, nothing fancy. I added colors and a pattern to most parts of the armor. I will include different colors to replace the red if enough people ask. Female version is WIP. I'm fairly new to modding, so please let me know if I messed anything up or you see a mistake in the armor.

To install simply place (extract) the folder in the Skyrim directory (where the exe is). I recommend you just use the Nexus Mod Manager.

It WILL replace your nightingale male armor.

You can have a cape-less version, but you need to install [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1560] this mod by Gilead Maerlyn, [/url] or a similar mod.

Also available on [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=87353970] Steam [/url]
author: Accurse
